short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Topic modelling, performance testing and sentiment analysis of web pages in a chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Topic modelling, performance testing and sentiment analysis of web pages in a chrome extension.

- Using powerful insights technologies for analyzing content and performance of a web page.
- Using recent natural language processing technologies for modeling the topics, identifying and analyzing the sentiment of a web page.
- Allow to share web pages on social media using 1 click.
